mapper.select: select s.member_idx, s.sit_idx, sit_title, sit_intro, sit_addr, s_fee, m_fee, b_fee, sit_client, sit_starpoint, sit_starcount, member_name, pet_idx, pet_age, pet_name, pet_gender from sitter s inner join pet p on s.member_idx = p.member_idx inner join member m on s.member_idx = m.member_idx where s.member_idx=#{member_idx}

select a.*, NVL(b.countlike, 0) as countlike from ( select r.*, m.member_name member_namer, member_photo from review_board r, member m where r.member_idx = m.member_idx and sit_idx = #{ param1 } order by review_idx desc ) a left outer join ( select review_idx, count(review_idx) countlike from review_like where reviewLike_stt = 1 group by review_idx ) b on a.review_idx = b.review_idx
select typsrv_expln , typSrv_service from type_service where typsrv_idx in ( select typsrv_idx from available_services where sit_idx = #{ sit_idx } ) order by typsrv_idx asc
select typTag_expln from type_tag where typTag_idx in (select typTag_idx from sitter_tag where sit_idx=#{ sit_idx })
select * from sit_book where sit_idx = #{ sit_idx }
mapper.insert: insert into sit_book values (seq_sit_book_idx.nextval, #{ sit_idx }, #{ sbook_start }, #{ sbook_end } )
mapper.select: select * from sitter where sit_idx not in (select sit_idx from sit_book where ( sbook_start <= #{ sbook_start } and sbook_end > #{ sbook_start } ) or (sbook_start < #{ sbook_end } and sbook_end >= #{ sbook_end } ))
select typtag_expln from type_tag where typtag_idx in (select typtag_idx from sitter_tag where sit_idx = #{ sit_idx })
select typsrv_idx from available_services where sit_idx = #{ sit_idx }
